name: Cade Clair
description: '''Kamoren White''', known professionally as '''Cade Clair''', is an American rapper, singer-songwriter, and record producer. He is known for the tracks "Shake That Shit" with [[Jnhygs]], "[[Let Me See Ya Move]]" with [[Lumi Athena]], the remix of "[[Smoke It Off]]", and "[[Look Don't Touch]]" with [[Odetari]]. Several of these songs gained popularity on [[TikTok]], with "Look Don't Touch" earning a gold certification from the [[Recording Industry Association of America]] (RIAA).
